name: Raspberry Pi OS
description: The official operating system for Raspberry Pi computers. Optimized for ARM architecture and the Pi's unique hardware.
longDescription: Raspberry Pi OS is the official operating system for the incredibly popular Raspberry Pi single-board computers. Based on Debian, it's optimized for the Pi's ARM processor and includes software for GPIO access, camera modules, and other Pi-specific hardware. Whether you're building a media center, learning to code, or creating IoT projects, Raspberry Pi OS provides the foundation you need.

seo.title: OmniSet for Raspberry Pi OS | Pi Setup Made Easy
seo.description: Set up your Raspberry Pi with OmniSet. Configure your Pi for development, media center, or desktop use with one simple command.
